titleStmt.title: An exact account of the number of Parliament-men in England and Wales, and the Cinque-Ports; with the places where they are chosen. The whole number is 513.

publicationStmt.publisher: Sold by William Berry, at the sign of the Globe between Charing-cross and Whitehall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Globe between Charing-cross
